name: Yuuwaku Office Renai-ka
overview: Yuuwaku Office Renaika is a dating simulation game in which the player controls a young employee of an office and the game have 2 years last. During those 2 years the player's character have to make different project for his company. Depending of the success of those projects his stats and the way the rest of office employees consider him will change. During each week the player can choose what activities his character is going to do (study, gymnastic, appearance, go around town, call girls that he meet in the office to date them). He can buy different gifts and organize travels with the girls to be more appreciate by them. The game got different endings depending of how much money and how high the character stats are at the end of the 2 years. The game features japanese voice acting for the characters.
